text: Hippolytpuszta is a former village, now a part of Szabadegyháza, Hungary. The postal code is 2432. == Geography == Altitude of Hippolytpuszta is 122 meters. It currently has a population of around 2 (in 2001). It lies approximately 6 km north of Szabadegyháza. == References == Category:Villages in Hungary
title: Hippolytpuszta
